detectors.description: MyAdvancedToken (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/ee3d97023ceee396d7c1d6d7aab4724abfd572e9_TokenGAC.sol#176-245) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:TokenGAC.transfer(address,uint256) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/ee/ee3d97023ceee396d7c1d6d7aab4724abfd572e9_TokenGAC.sol#85-87)
